page.title: 15School Sports Day
page.content: Sports Day is a day when we have races and we have fun. We walk down to the Village Playing Field carrying the mats and apparatus. Our families come to watch. The youngest children have the first race then the older children take turns to race. These are the sorts of races we have :running , egg and spoon , sack , skipping , piggy-back , 3-legged and relay. "Kangaroo"; jumping down the track with a rubber ring between your knees. "Wellie Race"; the youngest children race with adults wellingtons on. We laugh a lot during that race. "Angel Race"; running with a rubber ring balanced on your head. After all the racing is over we have an ice-lolly.Then we collect all the apparatus and go back to school.
